name: Apple Snak
description:
Apple snak. There's a giant snake chasing after you and he's hungry for a tasty snack. Dodge the spikes, jump on bounce pads, collect coins and switch between daylight to avoid becoming a delicious meal.

Write your high scores in the comments below!

Controls:
Left Arrow Key - Move Left

Right Arrow Key - Move Right

Up Arrow Key - Jump

Down Arrow Key - Drop Through Platform

Enter - Select/Skip Animation

- (Minus) - Decrease Window Size

+ (Plus) - Increase Window Size

Made by Spicy Chicken (code) and Pixel Overload (graphics) for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam 3 in 7 days.

Check out Pixel Overload at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAfpcnw3DvpcggcHKos_mvQ!
